entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Temperature steady near plus 1.

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early in the morning then changing to rain late in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
